install.name: RokNewsRotator News
install.author: RocketTheme
install.description:
RokNewsRotator Module

NewsRotator module created for rt_mediamogul template

param.name: linktitle
param.label: Link Title
param.description: Use the Title to link to the main article

param.name: linkimage
param.label: Link Image
param.description: Use the Image to link to the main article

param.name: show_front
param.label: Frontpage Items
param.description: Show/Hide items designated for the Frontpage - only works when in Content Items only mode

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (default 5)

param.name: catid
param.label: Category
param.description: Selects items from a specific Category.

param.name: secid
param.label: Section
param.description: Selects items from a specific Secion.

param.name: jslib
param.label: Include Mootools JS Library
param.description: Select whether to include the JS lib as part of this module, Select No if the template already loads this

param.name: readmore
param.label: Read More Label
param.description: Text to display for readmore if titles are NOT linked

param.name: duration
param.label: Transition Duration
param.description: Duration in ms of cross-blend transition

param.name: delay
param.label: Delay Length
param.description: Time in ms of time between newsrotatores

param.name: preview_count
param.label: Preview Length
param.description: Length of characters to show in MooTools preview

param.name: autohide
param.label: AutoHide Controls
param.description: When hovering over the RokNewsRotator controls will fade in, eitherway they fade out.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
